fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Mom, 68-year-old Man, WWII Veteran, Ex-Pizza Delivery Guy, Ex-Janitor

fields.fieldTitle: Evil Insider / Enemy (singular) to push against

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Mortgage Banker, Botox Doctor, Real Estate Agent

fields.fieldTitle: Evil Insider / Enemy (plural) to push against

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Mortgage Bankers, Botox Doctors, Real Estate Agents

fields.fieldTitle: Amount made or saved monthly / yearly

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Look years younger, be a best-selling author, become famous

fields.fieldTitle: What they want to get, have, or accomplish - VERB

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Get younger looking skin, write your ebook, become a best-selling author

fields.fieldTitle: The emotional result / payoff they want

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: be rich and famous, love and respect, relief

fields.fieldTitle: Ideal person(singular) they expect to have "secret" they need

fieldHint.hint1: (Ex: super model, real estate investor, successful author, famous speaker)

fields.fieldTitle: Ideal person (plural) they expect to have "secret" they need

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: super models, real estate investors, successful authors, famous speakers
Ex: 7 days, a weekend, 24 hours, 27 minutes
Ex: pride, relief, confidence, love, excitement

fields.fieldTitle: Painful thing / action they want to avoid
